title: Armadylean guard

properties.name: description
properties.value: Armadylean guards appear when doing elite clue scroll coordinates. They call out "No warning! Begone!" upon appearing.

Monster ID6587

Armadylean guards appear when doing elite clue scroll coordinates. They call out "No warning! Begone!" upon appearing.

The guard will spawn upon digging at the correct coordinates, and must be defeated in order to advance in the Treasure Trail. Like the aviansies found in the God Wars Dungeon, the guard is flying too high to be attacked using melee, and must instead be defeated by means of ranged, magic or a salamander. Since the guard only uses ranged attacks, Protect from Missiles will circumvent all damage.

After defeating the guard, the player must dig at the same spot again, and will be allowed to do so unhindered.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
19 May 2021
(update)

The NPC's name was changed from "Armadylian guard" to "Armadylean guard".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There is currently a glitch where the guard's death cry is heard twice. The second cry happens when the drop appears, as the drop seems to have a small delay.
  • Despite being an aviansie, killing an Armadylean guard does not count toward an aviansie slayer task.
